tag_list: george, liu, streams-im, apollis, web-developer, business
overview:
George Liu is currently the Founder and Project Manager of the website application, Streams.im. He shares the responsibility of developing the new startup with his partner Matthew Auld.

Born in China, George moved to Canada when he was 5 years old. From the age of 10, he developed an interest in website development. He concentrated his free time to study and learn methods of web development as well as business.

Since the beginning of his passion of technology, he had developed a wide range of programs, websites and services that brought him experience at a young age. At the age of 16, he is currently the Project Manager of Streams.im.

Recently, George Liu has teamed up with the developers at Indy Opportunities to assist with their projects and also to develop Shadow Legions, a browser based mmorpg. The game is set to be complete early 2012 under a partnership of InOp and the new web development division, Fusion30.
